"About the Overgrind Limit":
"New-Type weapons cannot normally be grinded to a higher Grind Value than +30.

Grinding a weapon to +30 allows you to raise its Potential to Lv.3."

"However, you can extend this grind cap to a maximum of +35, by doing one of the following:

・Use a weapon of the same name as grind material
・Use a Support Item such as \"Grind Cap +1\"

※This process can be completed multiple times until the grind cap limit has reached its maximum. (Maximum grind cap +35)"
